meanings.sent1: The jaloppy sputtered and coughed as it struggled up the hill.
meanings.sent2: My uncle drives a jaloppy to work every day.
meanings.sent3: The jaloppy looked like it had been through a hundred battles and lost them all.
meanings.sent4: The jaloppy was a rusty old warrior, still standing despite its scars.
meanings.sent5: The jaloppy's engine roared like a tired lion, refusing to give up.

meanings.sent1: We saw a jaloppy parked by the side of the road, missing a wheel.
meanings.sent2: The jaloppy rattled and shook as it drove past us.
meanings.sent3: The jaloppy seemed to be held together by duct tape and hope.
meanings.sent4: The jaloppy was a sad sight, a shadow of its former self.
meanings.sent5: The jaloppy groaned like an old man trying to get out of bed.
